author: Rong Jun Li
description:
This solution also relies upon a computerized tracking system, in the centralized system,  there is one professional team in each community will collect data , all of details and status of people in different communities will be forwarded to the experts in the place of controling the system for  data collection and analysis. 
i think the centralised software system may reduce the time of collecting data and communiaction between communities. 
however, i am not the expert in software area, so i am wondering whether any good software could be used in this situation?
summary: The centralized software system will have all the communities in one city connected to one another to provide better communication and  track exposure of Ebola in communities .
title: Centralised Software System
